member.name: T:Goedel.Cryptography.Jose.IActivate
member.summary: Interface providing key activation functions. This interface is supported by PrivateKeyUDF allowing keys to be derived from a pair of seeds. Devices whose keys are bound to an HSM should provide a class exposing the IActivate interface that exposes the necessary functionality for key location, activation and use.

member.name: M:Goedel.Cryptography.Jose.IActivate.ActivatePrivate(System.String,Goedel.Cryptography.IKeyLocate,Goedel.Cryptography.KeyUses,System.String,Goedel.Cryptography.CryptoAlgorithmId)
member.summary: Generate a composite private key by generating private keys by means of the activation seed and the class instance generator.
member.param: The key collection to register the private key to
